description: Dashboard to display Victron MPPT values with better Aggregation

panels.description:
Verlauf von Spannung und Strom der Batterie,  
gemessen vom Messwiderstand in Volt und Ampere.

targets.query:
timeRangeSeconds = int(v: uint(v: v.timeRangeStop) - uint(v: v.timeRangeStart)) / 1000000000
timeRangeHours = timeRangeSeconds / 3600

bucketName = if timeRangeHours <= 72 then "victron"
             else if timeRangeHours <= 720 then "victron_5m"
             else "victron_1h"

fieldName = if bucketName == "victron" then "voltage" else "voltage_last"

from(bucket: bucketName)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "ve_direct_battery")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == fieldName)
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "Volt")

timeRangeSeconds = int(v: uint(v: v.timeRangeStop) - uint(v: v.timeRangeStart)) / 1000000000
timeRangeHours = timeRangeSeconds / 3600

bucketName = if timeRangeHours <= 72 then "victron"
             else if timeRangeHours <= 720 then "victron_5m"
             else "victron_1h"

fieldName = if bucketName == "victron" then "current" else "current_last"

from(bucket: bucketName)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "ve_direct_battery")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == fieldName)
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "Ampere")

from(bucket: "victron")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "ve_direct_battery")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "voltage")
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> last()

from(bucket: "victron")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "ve_direct_battery")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "current")
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> last()

timeRangeSeconds = int(v: uint(v: v.timeRangeStop) - uint(v: v.timeRangeStart)) / 1000000000
timeRangeHours = timeRangeSeconds / 3600

bucketName = if timeRangeHours <= 72 then "victron"
             else if timeRangeHours <= 720 then "victron_5m"
             else "victron_1h"

fieldName = if bucketName == "victron" then "power" else "power_last"
windowEvery = if bucketName == "victron" then 5m else v.windowPeriod

from(bucket: bucketName)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "ve_direct_load")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == fieldName)
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: windowEvery, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "Leistung")

from(bucket: "victron")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "ve_direct_load")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "power")
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> last()

from(bucket: "victron")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "ve_direct_load")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "current")
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> last()

timeRangeSeconds = int(v: uint(v: v.timeRangeStop) - uint(v: v.timeRangeStart)) / 1000000000
timeRangeHours = timeRangeSeconds / 3600

bucketName = if timeRangeHours <= 72 then "victron"
             else if timeRangeHours <= 720 then "victron_5m"
             else "victron_1h"

fieldName = if bucketName == "victron" then "power" else "power_last"
windowEvery = if bucketName == "victron" then 5m else v.windowPeriod

from(bucket: bucketName)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "ve_direct_battery")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == fieldName)
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: windowEvery, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "Leistung")

from(bucket: "victron")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "ve_direct_battery")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "power")
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> last()

from(bucket: "victron")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "ve_direct_load")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "status")
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> last()

import "timezone"
import "date"

option location = timezone.location(name: "Europe/Berlin")

stopDay = date.truncate(t: v.timeRangeStop, unit: 1d)

timeRangeHours = int(v: (uint(v: v.timeRangeStop) - uint(v: v.timeRangeStart)) / uint(v: 1h))

bucketName = if timeRangeHours <= 72 then "victron" else if timeRangeHours <= 720 then "victron_5m" else "victron_1h"

fieldName = if bucketName == "victron" then "power" else "power_last"

from(bucket: bucketName)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: stopDay)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "ve_direct_battery")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == fieldName)
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value / 1000.0}))
  |> window(every: 1d, createEmpty: true)
  |> integral(unit: 1h)
  |> duplicate(column: "_stop", as: "_time")
  |> window(every: inf)
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "Leistung")

import "timezone"
import "date"

option location = timezone.location(name: "Europe/Berlin")

stopDay = date.truncate(t: v.timeRangeStop, unit: 1d)

timeRangeHours = int(v: (uint(v: v.timeRangeStop) - uint(v: v.timeRangeStart)) / uint(v: 1h))

bucketName = if timeRangeHours <= 72 then "victron" else if timeRangeHours <= 720 then "victron_5m" else "victron_1h"

fieldName = if bucketName == "victron" then "power" else "power_last"

from(bucket: bucketName)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: stopDay)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "ve_direct_load")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == fieldName)
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value / 1000.0}))
  |> window(every: 1d, createEmpty: true)
  |> integral(unit: 1h)
  |> duplicate(column: "_stop", as: "_time")
  |> window(every: inf)
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "Leistung")

options.content:
Solarladeregler / Solarmodul

Victron BlueSolar MPPT 75/15 Solarladeregler 12-48V 15A

Monokristallines Solarmodul 200 W 23 V

targets.query:
from(bucket: "victron")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "ve_direct_today")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "power")
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> max()
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "Watt")

// Automatische Bucket-Auswahl für Solarmodul-Leistung
timeRangeSeconds = int(v: uint(v: v.timeRangeStop) - uint(v: v.timeRangeStart)) / 1000000000
timeRangeHours = timeRangeSeconds / 3600

bucketName = if timeRangeHours <= 72 then "victron"
             else if timeRangeHours <= 720 then "victron_5m"
             else "victron_1h"

fieldName = if bucketName == "victron" then "power" else "power_last"

from(bucket: bucketName)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "ve_direct_panel")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == fieldName)
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "Watt")

// CS_Status mit dynamischer Bucket-Auswahl
timeRangeHours = int(v: (uint(v: v.timeRangeStop) - uint(v: v.timeRangeStart)) / uint(v: 1h))

bucketName = if timeRangeHours <= 72 then "victron" else if timeRangeHours <= 720 then "victron_5m" else "victron_1h"

fieldName = if bucketName == "victron" then "CS_Status" else "CS_Status_last"

from(bucket: bucketName)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "ve_direct_victron")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == fieldName)
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "Status")

from(bucket: "victron")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "ve_direct_panel")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "power")
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> last()
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "Watt")

from(bucket: "victron")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "ve_direct_today")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "yield")
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> last()
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "Wh")

panels.description:
Verlauf von Spannung und Strom der Solarmodule,  
gemessen vom Solarladeregler in Volt und Ampere.

targets.query:
// Automatische Bucket-Auswahl für Solarpanel-Spannung
timeRangeSeconds = int(v: uint(v: v.timeRangeStop) - uint(v: v.timeRangeStart)) / 1000000000
timeRangeHours = timeRangeSeconds / 3600

bucketName = if timeRangeHours <= 72 then "victron"
             else if timeRangeHours <= 720 then "victron_5m"
             else "victron_1h"

fieldName = if bucketName == "victron" then "voltage" else "voltage_last"

from(bucket: bucketName)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "ve_direct_panel")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == fieldName)
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "Volt")

// Automatische Bucket-Auswahl für Solarpanel-Strom
timeRangeSeconds = int(v: uint(v: v.timeRangeStop) - uint(v: v.timeRangeStart)) / 1000000000
timeRangeHours = timeRangeSeconds / 3600

bucketName = if timeRangeHours <= 72 then "victron"
             else if timeRangeHours <= 720 then "victron_5m"
             else "victron_1h"

fieldName = if bucketName == "victron" then "current" else "current_last"

from(bucket: bucketName)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "ve_direct_panel")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == fieldName)
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "Ampere")

panels.title: Solarpanel

targets.query:
from(bucket: "victron")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "ve_direct_panel")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "voltage")
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: "Aktuell" }))
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement"])

from(bucket: "victron")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "ve_direct_panel")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "voltage")
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> max()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: "max." }))
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement"])

from(bucket: "victron")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "ve_direct_panel")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "current")
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: "Aktuell" }))
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement"])

from(bucket: "victron")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "ve_direct_panel")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "current")
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> max()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: "max." }))
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement"])

// Tageshöchstwert - ve_direct_today enthält bereits Tageswerte
timeRangeHours = int(v: (uint(v: v.timeRangeStop) - uint(v: v.timeRangeStart)) / uint(v: 1h))

bucketName = if timeRangeHours <= 72 then "victron" else if timeRangeHours <= 720 then "victron_5m" else "victron_1h"

fieldName = if bucketName == "victron" then "power" else "power_max"

from(bucket: bucketName)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "ve_direct_today")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == fieldName)
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "Wp")

// Tagesleistung - ve_direct_today enthält bereits Tageswerte
timeRangeHours = int(v: (uint(v: v.timeRangeStop) - uint(v: v.timeRangeStart)) / uint(v: 1h))

bucketName = if timeRangeHours <= 72 then "victron" else if timeRangeHours <= 720 then "victron_5m" else "victron_1h"

fieldName = if bucketName == "victron" then "yield" else "yield_last"

from(bucket: bucketName)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "ve_direct_today")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == fieldName)
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "Wh")

from(bucket: "victron")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "ve_direct_victron")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "MPPT_Status")
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> last()
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "Status")

from(bucket: "victron")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "ve_direct_victron")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "CS_Status")
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> last()
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "Status")

from(bucket: "victron")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "ve_direct_victron")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "ERR_Status")
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> last()
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "Status")

title: Victron SmartSolar V2
